com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

Class ListLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.ListLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, Serializable

    public class ListLayout
extends Object
implements LayoutManager
    ListLayout renders out its items in a list.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis, Mark Reeves
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ListLayout.Alignment
      An enumeration of possible values for horizontal alignment of the components added to the layout relative to the containing WPanel.
      static class  ListLayout.Separator
      An enumeration of possible values for the item separator.
      static class  ListLayout.Type
      An enumeration of possible values for the list type.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ListLayout()
      Default constructor creates an unordered, LEFT aligned, DOT separated, STACKED list - i.e. a pretty much default HTML list.
      ListLayout(boolean ordered)
      Creates a stacked ListLayout with a specified ordered setting.
      ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type)
      Creates a ListLayout with a specified type.
      ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type, ListLayout.Alignment alignment)
      Creates a ListLayout with a specified type.
      ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type, ListLayout.Alignment alignment, ListLayout.Separator separator, boolean ordered)
      Creates a ListLayout with the specified attributes.
      ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type, ListLayout.Alignment alignment, ListLayout.Separator separator, boolean ordered, int gap)
      Deprecated. 
      use ListLayout(Type, Alignment, Separator, boolean, Size)
      ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type, ListLayout.Alignment alignment, ListLayout.Separator separator, boolean ordered, int hgap, int vgap)
      Deprecated. 
      use ListLayout(Type, Alignment, Separator, boolean, Size)
      ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type, ListLayout.Alignment alignment, ListLayout.Separator separator, boolean ordered, Size space)
      Creates a ListLayout with the specified attributes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ListLayout

        public ListLayout()
        Default constructor creates an unordered, LEFT aligned, DOT separated, STACKED list - i.e. a pretty much default HTML list.

      • ListLayout

        public ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type)
        Creates a ListLayout with a specified type. The ListLayout will be unordered, leftAligned, and DOT separated.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of list to create.

      • ListLayout

        public ListLayout(boolean ordered)
        Creates a stacked ListLayout with a specified ordered setting. The ListLayout will be stacked, left aligned, and DOT separated (if not ordered) or numbered (if ordered).
        Parameters:
        ordered - true to create an ordered list.

      • ListLayout

        public ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type,
          ListLayout.Alignment alignment)
        Creates a ListLayout with a specified type. The ListLayout will be unordered, leftAligned, and DOT separated.
        Parameters:
        type - he type of list to create
        alignment - the alignment of the list relative to its containing WPanel.

      • ListLayout

        public ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type,
          ListLayout.Alignment alignment,
          ListLayout.Separator separator,
          boolean ordered)
        Creates a ListLayout with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        type - the list type.
        alignment - the item alignment.
        separator - the separator to display between items.
        ordered - whether the list is an ordered list.

      • ListLayout

        @Deprecated
public ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type,
                     ListLayout.Alignment alignment,
                     ListLayout.Separator separator,
                     boolean ordered,
                     int hgap,
                     int vgap)
        Deprecated. use ListLayout(Type, Alignment, Separator, boolean, Size)
        Creates a ListLayout with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        type - the list type.
        alignment - the item alignment.
        separator - the separator to display between items.
        ordered - whether the list is an ordered list.
        hgap - The horizontal gap between the list items. Used only when type is Type.FLAT.
        vgap - The vertical gap between the list items. Used only when type is not Type.FLAT.

      • ListLayout

        @Deprecated
public ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type,
                     ListLayout.Alignment alignment,
                     ListLayout.Separator separator,
                     boolean ordered,
                     int gap)
        Deprecated. use ListLayout(Type, Alignment, Separator, boolean, Size)
        Creates a ListLayout with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        type - the list type
        alignment - the item alignment
        separator - the separator to display between items
        ordered - whether the list is an ordered list
        gap - the gap between the components added to the layouts

      • ListLayout

        public ListLayout(ListLayout.Type type,
          ListLayout.Alignment alignment,
          ListLayout.Separator separator,
          boolean ordered,
          Size space)
        Creates a ListLayout with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        type - the list type
        alignment - the item alignment
        separator - the separator to display between items
        ordered - whether the list is an ordered list
        space - the space between the components added to the layouts
